content.title: Learn proper portion size.
content.description: To avoid eating too much of even the healthiest foods, keep track of how much you're eating. For most people, meat servings should be about the size of a deck of cards and other servings vary by the type of food.
Strive for at least 150 minutes of exercise per week. Break it down to 40 Minutes 4 days a week, 30 minutes 5 days a week, or however you'd like!
